oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Map of the Cherokee Nation, 1760
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: T. Kitchin
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A New Map of the Cherokee Nation with the Names of the Towns & Rivers They are Situated on No. Lat. From 34 to 36. London Magazine, 1760. Engraved from an Indian Draught by T. Kitchin.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Maps; Indigenous peoples;
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: 912.703 1760 Kitchin Map of the Cherokee Nation
